title: La La Land
subtitle: 2016, Damien Chazelle
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
subtitle: 2021, Jon Watts
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter Parker asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
subtitle: 2015, Alfonso Gomez-Rejon
description: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: Avengers: Endgame
subtitle: 2019, Anthony Russo, Joe Russo
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos's actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Inception
subtitle: 2010, Christopher Nolan
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious gets a chance to redeem himself by planting an idea in the mind of a CEO.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
subtitle: 1994, Frank Darabont
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Rockstar
subtitle: 2011, Imtiaz Ali
description: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer, a rich girl who encourages him to pursue his passion.

title: Oohalu Gusagusalade
subtitle: 2014, Srinivas Avasarala
description: A romantic comedy about the adventures of a small-town man who moves to Hyderabad to pursue his dreams and the love triangle that ensues between him, a beautiful girl, and her strict and protective brother.
